Name: D3D INSIDE
About the game: D3D INSIDE — a single 3D first-person shooter with quest chains, resource management and pumping. Demons invaded the Mob city, and the only way to destroy them is vodka. The main character is the grandfather, who has a CCM for throwing grenades. Game Features: • You play as a grandfather • Epic boss battles • NPC side quests • Leveling • Bullet Hell
